connector.description:
Send data to an SFTP Server.

In the header, you can set the `file` / `ce-file` property to specify the filename to upload.

If you do not set the property in the header, the Kamelet uses the exchange ID for the filename.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionHost.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionHost.description: The hostname of the FTP server

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionPort.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.connectionPort.description: The port of the FTP server

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.username
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.username.description: The username to access the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.password
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.password.description: The password to access the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.passiveMode.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.passiveMode
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.passiveMode.description: Specifies to use passive mode connection.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.fileExist.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.fileExist
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.fileExist.description: How to behave in case of file already existent.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.binary.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.binary
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.binary.description: Specifies the file transfer mode, BINARY or ASCII. Default is ASCII (false).

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyFile.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyFile
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyFile.description: Set the private key file so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyPassph.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyPassphrase
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyPassph.description: Set the private key file passphrase so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyUri.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyUri
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.privateKeyUri.description: Set the private key file (loaded from classpath by default) so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.strictHostKeyChe.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.strictHostKeyChecking
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.strictHostKeyChe.description: Sets whether to use strict host key checking.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.useUserKnownHost.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.useUserKnownHostsFile
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.useUserKnownHost.description: If knownHostFile has not been explicit configured then use the host file from System.getProperty(user.home)/.ssh/known_hosts.

camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.autoCreate.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.autoCreate
camel.kamelet.sftp-sink.autoCreate.description: Automatically create the directory the files should be written to.
